section.p: This template represents the insurance coverage intended to cover an act or procedure.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-31947, CONF:1098-31948 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.129"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31945)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31950)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-31951)/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31952, CONF:1098-31953)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31954)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31955)

MAY contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32178)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31967)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1098-31968)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act such that it (CONF:1098-31969)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31970)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="INT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-31971)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31972)
These act/identifiers are unique identifiers for the policy or program providing the coverage.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Source of Payment Typology (PHDSC) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3591 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-31973)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31954)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31955)

Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.129"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.129"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1735143951"/> <code code="48768-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Payment Sources"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="active"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="1167485951"/> <code code="1729966858"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1974339088"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.221.5" codeSystemName="Source of Payment Typology (PHDSC)"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="active"/> </act> </entryRelationship> </act>
